    • Constructor Detail

      • Dungeongenerator

        public Dungeongenerator(int height,
                        int width,
                        int minRoomHeight,
                        int minRoomWidth)
        create a dungeon generator that creates a dungeon of some size
        Parameters:
        height - the desired height of the dungeon
        width - the desired width of the dungeon
        minRoomHeight - the minimum room height
        minRoomWidth - the minimum roo width

        y - y-value of the corridor

      • getCarvableNeighbours

        public OwnArrayList getCarvableNeighbours(CorridorCell cell)
        Checks around the cell and sees where we can carve to
        Parameters:
        cell - The cell the neighbours of which we want to get
        Returns:
        returns a list of neighbours cells that we can move to next

      • isCarvable

        public boolean isCarvable(int x,
                          int y,
                          String direction)
        Checks if a certain spot can be carved
        Parameters:
        x - the x-value of the spot
        y - the y-value of the spot
        direction - the direction in which we are moving. For example if we are coming from the cell that is below this spot, the direction is UP
        Returns:
        true, if the cell can be carved to, else false

      • cellIsTooCloseToARoom

        public boolean cellIsTooCloseToARoom(int x,
                                     int y)
        Methods checks if some cell is to close to a room
        Parameters:
        x - x-value of the spot we are checking
        y - y-value of the spot we are chekcing
        Returns:
        true, if it is too close, false if not

      • cellIsINaRoom

                             int y)
        Checks if a cell is in a room
        Parameters:

        y - y-value of the spot
        Returns:
        true if the cell is in a room, false if not

      • carve

        public void carve(CorridorCell cell)
        Carves a corridor to a certain cell or a spot in the dungeon
        Parameters:
        cell - Spot we want to turn into a corridor

      • connectDungeon

        public void connectDungeon()
        Method connects the different regions(rooms and corridors) in the dungeon. The method uses the Union Find data structure and Kruskal's Algorithm

      • findConnectors

        public OwnArrayList findConnectors()
        Method finds all possible connectors that can connect two different regions in the dungeon
        Returns:
        List of Connector-objects that connect two different regions

      • isConnector

        public boolean isConnector(int x,
                           int y)
        Method checks if a certain point in the dungeon can be a connector
        Parameters:
        x - x-value of the spot we are checking
        y - y-value of the spot we are checking
        Returns:
        true, if given point can be a connector. Otherwise false

      • connectsRegions

        public int[] connectsRegions(int x,
                             int y)
        Method checks which two regions a connector can connect together
        Parameters:
        x - x-value of the connector
        y - y-value of the connector
        Returns:
        an array with two values which refer to the connectable regions

      • removeDeadEnds

        public void removeDeadEnds()
        Method removes dead-ends. Loops through the dungeon and when it finds a spot that could be a dead-end(not a wall) it calls the method deadEndRemover

      • deadEndRemover

        public void deadEndRemover(int x,
                           int y)
        First the method checks if the spot actually is a dead-end. It's a dead-end when it has 0 or 1 exits. If it's not it does nothing. If it is it gets rid of the dead-end by placing a wall there and then moves recursivly calls itself at the spot the previous corridor cell was connected to.
        Parameters:
        x - x-value of the spot we are checking
        y - y-value of the spot we are checking

      • makeItPretty

        public void makeItPretty()
        Makes the dungeon pretty and gets rid of the integers in it
